freeIndividualAssessment.freeAssessmentDes: Join our EQ360 Emotional Intelligence Assessment free trial!. Track your progress with MyEQ360 and master your emotional skills for greater success. Understand yourself better and enhance your communication abilities with our comprehensive evaluation. Start mastering your emotions today and unlock your full potential!

EqDescription.EqDef: Emotional Intelligence (EQ) means understanding and managing emotions in yourself and others. It is important because it helps you communicate better, build stronger relationships, and make smarter decisions. EQ also assists in handling challenges effectively and creating a positive atmosphere, whether in academic, professional, business, or personal life. Developing EQ involves knowing yourself better and maintaining control over your emotions, which positions you for success both now and in the future.

individualFaq.q1: Q. HOW LONG IS THE EQ/EMOTIONAL INTELLIGENCE TEST?
individualFaq.a1: A. The test consists of 55 questions and takes about 5-10 minutes to complete.
individualFaq.q2: Q. WHAT WILL MY EQ TEST RESULTS LOOK LIKE?
individualFaq.a2: A. Your results show your scores on the five dimensions of emotional intelligence.
individualFaq.q3: Q. HOW CAN I ACCESS MY EQ TEST RESULTS?
individualFaq.a3: A. After you take a test, you will have the option to create an account by entering your email address. If you create an account, you can view your test results at any time by returning to Truity.com and logging into your account. We do not email your results to you.
individualFaq.q4: Q. DO I NEED TO COMPLETE THIS EMOTIONAL INTELLIGENCE TEST ALL AT ONCE?
individualFaq.a4: A. If you’ve created an account and are logged in when you take the test, your responses will be saved as you go through the test. If you do not log in to a Truity account before starting the test, your progress will not be saved and you will need to complete the test all at once.
individualFaq.q5: Q. IS THIS PERSONALITY TEST REALLY FREE?
individualFaq.a5: You do not need to purchase or register to take this test or view your results.

assessmentInstructions.questionsAsked: You’ll be asked a series of questions about how well you:
assessmentInstructions.feelEmpathy: Feel and show empathy for others
assessmentInstructions.rightAnswer: There are no right answers and this is the first step on your journey to understanding your EQ at your own pace.

preAssessmentComplete.preCompletedAssessmentDescription: You are about to be presented with a series of statements; you’ll just need to select the response corresponding to how frequently you believe that applies to you (“Almost Never”, “Rarely”, “Sometimes”, “Often”, or “Almost Always”). There’s no time limit to complete the assessment but give yourself about 20 minutes to finish. If you need to take a break, you can resume at a later time but we suggest completing the assessment in one sitting.
preAssessmentComplete.assessmentTimeLimitDescription: . There’s no time limit to complete the assessment but give yourself about 20 minutes to finish. If you need to take a break, you can resume at a later time but we suggest completing the assessment in one sitting.
preAssessmentComplete.uponFinishing: Upon finishing, you’ll receive a snapshot of your current SEL abilities
